remarks:
Ordering on reals is transitive.  Axiom 19 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  This restates ~ ax-pre-lttrn with ordering on the extended reals.  New proofs should use ~ lttr instead for naming consistency.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) 

---

 Ordering on reals is transitive.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This restates ~ ax-pre-lttrn with ordering on the extended reals.  New proofs should use ~ lttr instead for naming consistency.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
statement: axlttrn $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( ( A < B /\ B < C ) -> A < C ) ) $.
